thread.title: North Korea "possibly" behind Coincheck hack - sources

title: North Korea "possibly" behind Coincheck hack - sources
text:
North Korea "possibly" behind Coincheck hack - sources 5:08am EST - 01:05 
Sources tell Reuters that South Korea's intelligence agency told lawmakers North Korean hackers could have been behind the $530 million theft of virtual coins from a Japanese cryptocurrency exchange last month. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Sources tell Reuters that South Korea's intelligence agency told lawmakers North Korean hackers could have been behind the $530 million theft of virtual coins from a Japanese cryptocurrency exchange last month.
